Contentious material about living persons that is unsourced or poorly sourced **must be removed immediately** from the article and its talk page, especially if potentially libelous. *Find sources:* "Hari McCoy" – news **·** newspapers **·** books **·** scholar **·** JSTOR *(December 2022)* *(Learn how and when to remove this message)* *(Learn how and when to remove this message)* **Hari Connor Vinay McCoy** (born 11 September 2002) is an English [footballer](/wiki/Association_football) who plays as a [winger](/wiki/Winger_(association_football)) for [Clapton](/wiki/Clapton_F.C.). ## Club career ### Tampines Rovers As a youth player, McCoy joined [Tampines Rovers](/wiki/Tampines_Rovers_FC) in 2018. ### ASD San Luca Before the second half of 2020–21, he signed for [Serie D](/wiki/Serie_D) side ASD San Luca in Italy after joining the youth academy of Portuguese club [Rio Ave](/wiki/Rio_Ave_F.C.) in 2019. ### Balestier Khalsa Before the 2022 season, he signed for [Balestier Khalsa](/wiki/Balestier_Khalsa_FC) in Singapore and later debuted on 8 May 2022 against [Tampines Rovers](/wiki/Tampines_Rovers_FC). ### Weymouth In November 2022, he joined [National League South](/wiki/National_League_South) side [Weymouth](/wiki/Weymouth_F.C.). ##
